creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Nightly build currently allows adding:
- Config elements
- Assertions
- Listeners

3.3 also allowed adding Samplers, pre/post processors

Same issue for Include Controller which currently allows adding:
- Config elements
- Assertions
- Listeners
- Timer
